cards.name: Berserker
cards.text: Berserker enters play ready and enraged. Fight: Destroy Berserker.

cards.name: Skirmisher
cards.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)

cards.name: Nirbor Firewing
cards.text: At the start of your turn, if Nirbor Firewing is in your discard, you may destroy a friendly token creature. If you do, put Nirbor Firewing into play ready.  Destroyed: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Revna Starsong
cards.text: Each friendly Berserker loses all fight effects.

cards.name: Broken Axe Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner's deck. If you do, deal 6 D to an enemy creature.

cards.name: Vow of Blood
cards.text: Enhance Damage DamagePlay: Deal 2 Damage to each damaged enemy creature.

cards.name: Crogg The Clumsy
cards.text: Splash-attack 2. (When this creature attacks, also deal 2 Damage to each of the attacked creature's neighbors.)

cards.name: Brawl In
cards.text: Play: Make 2 token creatures. Enrage them.

cards.name: Brikk Nastee
cards.text: After another friendly Brobnar creature fights, gain 1 Aember.

cards.name: Might Club
cards.text: Action: Ready and enrage a creature.

cards.name: Rowdy Skald
cards.text: Enhance Aember Damage Damage

cards.name: Shock Herder
cards.text: Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.) Play: Ready and fight with a neighboring creature.

cards.name: Ragnarok Prep
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Then, if you control more creatures than your opponent, your opponent loses 2 Aember.

cards.name: Diplomat
cards.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap' Each player gains 1 Æmber.

cards.name: Trader
cards.text: Action: Steal 1 A. Destroy Merchant.

cards.name: Prospector
cards.text: Destroyed: Draw a card.

cards.name: Strange Shell
cards.text: Strange Shell cannot fight or reap. Action: Put Strange Shell into your hand.

cards.name: Æmbitrage
cards.text: Your keys cost +1 Aember. During your "draw cards" step, refill your hand to 1 additional card.

cards.name: Corner the Market
cards.text: Play: During your opponent's next turn, they cannot play cards, and each time they discard a card from their hand, they make a token creature.

cards.name: Cursed Relic
cards.text: Enhance Aember Aember Aember Aember Aember Aember. You cannot play Cursed Relic or choose to discard it from your hand.

cards.name: Envoy of Ekwirrĕ
cards.text: Reap: Swap Envoy of Ekwirrĕ with one of its neighbors. Also swap all Aember, damage, counters, and upgrades on those creatures.

cards.name: Flea Market
cards.text: Action: Look at a random card in your opponent's hand. You may give your opponent 1 Aember. If you do, play that card as if it were yours.

cards.name: Molluscaller
cards.text: Reap: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly Strange Shell gets +3 power and loses all abilities.

cards.name: Talent Scout
cards.text: Talent Hunter can be used as if it belonged to the active house. Play: Look at your opponent's hand and play a creature as if it were yours. Your opponent gains control of Talent Hunter.

cards.name: Belligerent Guard
cards.text: Belligerent Guard enters play ready. Play: Your opponent draws a card.

cards.name: Exchange Program
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly flank creature and an enemy flank creature. If you do, swap control of those creatures.

cards.name: Niffle Paw
cards.text: This creature gains, "Reap: Destroy this creature and attach Niffle Paw to another creature.

cards.name: Outnegotiate
cards.text: Play: Choose a card in your discard pile. Steal Aember equal to the number of Aember bonus icons on it and put that card on the bottom of its owner's deck.

cards.name: Puzzling Trinket
cards.text: Enhance Aember Aember. When you resolve an Aember bonus icon, you may choose to resole it as a Capture, Damage, or Draw icon instead.

cards.name: Scrapscrounger
cards.text: Reap: Swap an artifact in your discard pile with a card in your hand.

cards.name: Transitory Philosopher
cards.text: Action: Steal 1 Aember for each enemy artifact.

cards.name: Ornate Talking Tray
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Ornate Talking Tray. Make a token creature.

cards.name: Closed-Door Negotiation
cards.text: Play: Your opponent draws a card. Steal 1 Aember. If you do and your opponent still has more Aember than you, trigger this effect again.

cards.name: Gemcoat Vendor
cards.text: Action: Steal 1 Aember. Deal 1 Damage to Gemcoat Vendor.

cards.name: General Ză Orhă
cards.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damge in return.) Play: For each forged key your opponent has, make a token creature.

cards.name: Generous Offer
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, steal 2 Aember.

cards.name: Hire On
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If there is a combined total of 6 Aember or more between both players' pools, archive Hire On.

cards.name: Mass Buyout
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature. Each player gains Æmber equal to half the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way (rounded up).

cards.name: Shopping Spree
cards.text: Play: Discard your hand. Draw a card for each card discarded this way.

cards.name: Steward Su-uzaynĕ
cards.text: Enhance Aember Aember Draw. (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: The Old Tinker
cards.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: The Visible Hand
cards.text: Play: Make 2 token creatures. Reveal your hand to your opponent.

cards.name: Blorb
cards.text: Blorb cannot reap. Destroyed: Return Blorb Hive from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Grunt
cards.text: no text

cards.name: Rebel
cards.text: Reap: Deal 1 D to a creature.

cards.name: Researcher
cards.text: Omni:  Reveal a Mars card from your hand and archive it.

cards.name: Blorb Hive
cards.text: Omni:'Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, make 2 Blorbs. Then, if you control 10 or more, Blorbs, destroy Blorb Hive and forge a key at no cost.

cards.name: Borka Rikk
cards.text: Each time a Mars card is discarded from your hand, make a token creature.

cards.name: White Aeronaut
cards.text: When you exhaust White Aeronaut to use Nautilixian, ward and heal Nautilixian completely.

cards.name: Martian Revolution
cards.text: Play: Destroy each friendly creature. For each creature destroyed this way, make a token creature.

cards.name: Space Invaders
cards.text: Play: Reveal any number of creatures from your hand. Put each creature revealed this way into play facedown as a token creature.

cards.name: Yxl the Iron Captain
cards.text: Play: Each friendly Ironyx creature captures 2 Aember.

cards.name: Clone Home
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If there are more friendly creatures than enemy creatures, archive Clone Home.

cards.name: Genetic Blast
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 Damage to a creature and each other creature with the same name as that creature.

cards.name: Glylyx Weaponsmith
cards.text: Enhance Damage Damage Draw. (These icons have been already added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Ironyx Rebel
cards.text:
Deploy. 
 '''Play:'''(?) Ready each of Ironyx Rebel's neighbors.

cards.name: Ironyx Vatminder
cards.text: Play/Destroyed: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Kaboom!
cards.text: Play: Put each Mars creature into its owner's archives. Destroy each creature. Gain 3 chains.

cards.name: Mk.2 Generator
cards.text: Mk.2 Generator enter play ready. Action: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Myx the Tallminded
cards.text: Your opponent's keys cost +1 Aember for each friendly Mars creature in play.

cards.name: Scoop Up
cards.text: Play: Put a friendly non-Mars creature and an enemy non-Mars creature into your archives. If that enemy creature would leave your archives, return it to its owner's hand instead.

cards.name: Cleric
cards.text: When Cleric enters play, capture 1 Aember.

cards.name: Defender
cards.text: no text

cards.name: Disciple
cards.text: Disciple gets +1 power and +1 armor for each Monk neighbor it has.

cards.name: Squire
cards.text: Taunt. (This creature's neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have  taunt.)

cards.name: Batariel of the Grey
cards.text: After Reap: Ready each Disciple.

cards.name: Friendship
cards.text: When this creature is dealt damage while it has at least one neighbor, instead distribute the damage to its neighbours as evenly as possible.

cards.name: Sariel the Steadfast
cards.text: While it is not your turn, your creatures cannot become exhausted.

cards.name: Zephon the Opulent
cards.text: Play: Make 2 token creatures. Zephon the Opulent cannot be used unless there are 2 or more friendly token creatures in play. After Reap: Gain 2 Aember.

cards.name: Hymn to Duma
cards.text: Each friendly creature gains, "Omni: Destroy this creature. A friendly creature captures 2 Aember."

cards.name: Absolve
cards.text: Play: Heal 1 Damage from each creature. Each creature healed this way captures 1 Aember from its opponent.

cards.name: Pandulf the Provoker
cards.text: Taunt. (This creature's neighbors can't be attacked unless they have taunt.) Play: Enrage an enemy creature.

cards.name: Knightapult
cards.text: Action: The next time a friendly creature enters play this turn, you may have it enter anywhere in your battleline, ready.

cards.name: Membership Drive
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Gain 1 Aember for each friendly token creature.

cards.name: Muster
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If your opponent has more Aember than you, archive Muster.

cards.name: Ostentatious Mount
cards.text:
Play: Move this creature anywhere in its controller's battleline.
This creature gains taunt. (This creature's neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)

cards.name: Retribution
cards.text: Play: If there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, destroy an enemy creature.

cards.name: Revered Monk
cards.text: Revered Monk gets +2 power for each of its Sanctum neighbors

cards.name: Bellatoran Warrior
cards.text: no text

cards.name: Senator
cards.text: Action: Keys cost +1 A during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Edict of Nerotaurus
cards.text: After a creature reaps, the next creature used this turn cannot reap. After a creature fights, the next creature used this turn cannot fight.

cards.name: Election
cards.text: Each creature gains, "After Reap: Put a 'for' or 'against' counter on Election".  If there are 6 'for' counters on Election, destroy Election and each creature.  If there are 6 'against' counters on Election, destroy each artifact.

cards.name: Magistrate Crispus
cards.text: At the end of your turn, each player takes control of each creature and artifact they own.

cards.name: Training Costs
cards.text: You cannot choose to discard Training Costs from your hand. Play: Lose 2 Aember. If you do not, shuffle Training Costs into your deck.

cards.name: Chaosodon
cards.text: Splash attack 3. (When this creature attacks, also deal 3 Damage to each of the attacked creature's neighbors.) Before Fight: Deal 3 Damage to each of Chaosodon's neighbors.

cards.name: Phalanx Leader
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature immediately to Phalanx Leader's left. After Fight/After Reap: Each creature to Phalanx Leader's left gets +2 power for the remainder of the turn.

cards.name: Aquilia, Lone Hero
cards.text: ''Omni:''' Capture 1 Aember if there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures.

cards.name: Ballistego
cards.text: ''Play:''' You may exalt Ballistego. While Ballistego has Aember on it, it gains splash-attack 3. (When this creature attacks, also deal 3 Damage to each of the attacked creature's neighbors.)

cards.name: Epic Poem
cards.text: Play: Exalt a friendly creature. Gain 1 Aember for each Aember on that creature.

cards.name: Grammaticus Thrax
cards.text: Enhance Capture Capture Damage. (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Pale Into Insignificance
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature with the lowest power.

cards.name: Recruit
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If you exalted a friendly creature this turn, archive Recruit.

cards.name: Symposium
cards.text: Play: Exalt, ready, and use a friendly creature. If it is a token creature, you may exalt, ready and use another friendly creature.

cards.name: Æmberling
cards.text: Æmberling cannot reap. You may Æmberling as if it were Aember in your pool. (Discard it, ignoring wards.)

cards.name: Cadet
cards.text: Destroyed: Ready Cadet's most powerful neighbor.

cards.name: Explorer
cards.text: After Reap: Look at the top card of your deck. You may discard it.

cards.name: Grunt Work
cards.text: Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order. Make a token creature.

cards.name: Norbyn's Cavern
cards.text: Each friendly Æmberling gets +3 power and gains skirmish.

cards.name: Quintrino Warp
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly creature and an enemy creature. Destroy those creatures and each creature that shares a house with either of them. Gain 1 chain.

cards.name: Photon Blast
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 Damage to a creature, with 1 Damage splash. If this damage destroys 1 or more creatures, make a token creature.

cards.name: Recorded History
cards.text: Play: Reveal up to 3 cards of different houses from your hand. Archive each card revealed this way.

cards.name: CPO Zytar
cards.text: Enhance Damage Draw Draw. (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Rogue Operation
cards.text: Play: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. Steal 1 Aember for each house represented among the discarded cards.

cards.name: Friendly Guide
cards.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) After you use one of Friendly Guide's neighbors, you may use Friendly Guide.

cards.name: Future Booster
cards.text: Omni: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Specialist Guthrak
cards.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) After Fight/After Reap: Capture 1 Aember for each house represented among Specialist Guthrak and its neighbors.

cards.name: Teamwork
cards.text: Play:Make a token creature. If there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, archive Teamwork.

cards.name: Cultist
cards.text: Action:  Destroy Cultist. If you do, Ward a friendly creature.

cards.name: Priest
cards.text: Action: Exhaust an enemy creature.

cards.name: Infection
cards.text: Play: Put 3 hatch counters on Infection.  At the start of your turn, remove 1 hatch counter from Infection. Then, if there are no hatch counters on it, destroy this creature and make 3 token creatures.

cards.name: Giltspine School
cards.text: Play: Make 3 token creatures. Token creatures do not ready during their controller's "ready cards" step.

cards.name: Tangaika
cards.text: You cannot play Tanagaika unless you control 4 or more Cultists. Splash-attack 5. After Fight: Gain 1 Æmber.

cards.name: Watch Your Step
cards.text: Play: Choose a house on your opponent's identity card. If they do not choose this house as their active house during their next turn, make 2 token creatures and ready them.

cards.name: Abyssal Sight
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, look at your opponent's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Stir-Crazy
cards.text: Play: Each ready creature captures 1 Aember from its opponent.

cards.name: Covetous Hema
cards.text: While Covetous Hema is not on a flank, it gains elusive. Play: Capture 3[[File:Enhance_aember.png|18px|frameless|class=aemberImg|link=|alt=Aember icon]].

cards.name: Crushing Deep
cards.text: Play: During your opponent's next turn, keys cost +3 Aember for each forged key they have.

cards.name: Fathom Reaver
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. While you control a token creature, your opponent refills their hand to 1 less card during the "draw cards" step.

cards.name: Adult Swim
cards.text: Play: Put each creature with power 3 or lower on top of its owner's deck in a random order.

cards.name: Skullback Crab
cards.text: Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature during a fight destroys the damaged creature.) Action: Steal 1 Aember.

cards.name: Sunk Cost
cards.text: Play: Choose a house. Your opponent discards a random card from their hand. If that card belongs to the chosen house, make a token creature.

cards.name: Initiation
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If you have fewer than 4 cards in hand, archive Initiation.

cards.name: Kamalani
cards.text: Destroyed: Make 2 token creatures.

cards.name: Kelpminder
cards.text: Enhance Capture Draw Draw . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)
